mdq:check.name: Resource creator Identifier Present
mdq:check.description: Check that a resource creator identifier exists.
mdq:check.code:
def call(): global output global status global creatorIdentifier
import metadig.variable as mvar
# A resource creatorIdentifier is not present if 'creatorIdentifier' not in globals() or creatorIdentifier is None: output = "A resource creator identifier was not found." status = "FAILURE" return False
# Convert all values to unicode creatorIdentifier = mvar.toUnicode(creatorIdentifier)
# Convert all values to unicode if(isinstance(creatorIdentifier, str)): creatorIdentifier = [creatorIdentifier]
# If only a single value is returned (vs type "list"), then convert to a list # for easier processing if (mvar.isBlank(creatorIdentifier)): output = "The resource creatorIdentifier identifier is blank." status = "FAILURE" return False else: # Check if resource creatorIdentifier identifier is a single string or arrayList if(isinstance(creatorIdentifier, str)): output = "The resource creator identifier '{}' was found.".format(creatorIdentifier) elif (isinstance(creatorIdentifier, list)): output = "The resource creator identifier '{}' was found (first of {} creator identifiers).".format(creatorIdentifier[0].strip(), len(creatorIdentifier))
status = "SUCCESS" return True
